Major_Arcs.title: Paul Bunyan's Circus Adventure
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows Paul Bunyan's unexpected involvement in a circus drama, from being a spectator to becoming the hero and briefly the strongman, culminating in his return to the quiet woods.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction at the Circus
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces Paul Bunyan at the circus and the audience's arrival and initial wonder.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival at the Circus and Giraffe Sighting

sub_scenes.title: Intervention and Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the unfolding conflict within the circus tent, Paul Bunyan's intervention, and the ensuing fight.

narrative_arcs.title: Confrontation with Billings and 'The Strongest Man'

sub_scenes.title: Resolution and Job Offer
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene concludes the immediate conflict, reveals the backstory, and presents Paul Bunyan with a job opportunity.

sub_scenes.title: Paul Bunyan as Strongman and Grasso's Revenge
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows Paul Bunyan in his new role and introduces Matto Grasso's revenge plot.

narrative_arcs.title: Paul Bunyan, the Circus Strongman and Grasso's Envy
Setting the Tent Ablaze and Paul Bunyan's Intervention

sub_scenes.title: Grasso's Ape Sabotage and Final Departure
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Grasso's second sabotage attempt with the ape, Paul Bunyan's intervention, and his decision to leave the circus.

narrative_arcs.title: The Big Ape is Set Loose
Paul Bunyan Grabs Gigantico and Flees

Major_Arcs.title: Marco Polo's Tibetan Encounter
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows Marco Polo's brief adventure in Tibet, encountering mystical elements and a talking severed head, leading to a new quest.

sub_scenes.title: Tibetan Mysticism and Severed Head Discovery
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces Marco Polo in Tibet and the bizarre encounter with a talking severed head.

narrative_arcs.title: Confrontation with the Awful Ogress of Tibet
Discovery and Plea of the Severed Head

sub_scenes.title: Journey to Hi-toun Begins
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene sets up the journey to Hi-toun based on the severed head's request.

narrative_arcs.title: The Gift of the Sacred Dagger and the Journey to Hi-toun
Arrival at Hi-toun and the City's Mourning

sub_scenes.title: Hi-toun's Trouble and a New Quest
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details the problem in Hi-toun and Marco Polo's decision to help find the missing princess.

narrative_arcs.title: Marco Polo Arrives in Hi-toun and Learns of Trouble
The Grief over Princess Lotus's Disappearance
A Plea for Help and the Suspicious Castle

sub_scenes.title: Entrapment in the Witch's Castle
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Marco Polo's entrapment in the ogress's castle and the revelation of her true nature.

narrative_arcs.title: Entering the Mysterious Castle and Summoning 'Poor Children'
The 'Poor Children' Revealed as Rats and Marco's Disgust
Confinement and the Pretense of Hospitality
Realization of Treachery and Ogress Revelation
Summoning the Monstrous Mice and Preparing for Battle
Sword Against Claws: The Fight Begins

sub_scenes.title: Capture and Escape from Ogre's Lair
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene covers Marco's capture and dramatic escape from the ogre and her minions.

narrative_arcs.title: Escape from Dungeon with Magic Knife

sub_scenes.title: Return to Hi-toun and Royal Reward
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene concludes Marco Polo's Tibetan adventure with a safe return and royal recognition.

narrative_arcs.title: Unusual Mourning Decorations and Safe Return Request

Major_Arcs.title: The Treasure of Agra and Revenge
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc tells a tale of betrayal, revenge, and the deadly pursuit of treasure in Agra, India.

sub_scenes.title: Prologue and Penal Colony Setting
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene sets the stage with a prologue and introduces the setting in a British penal colony.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival at the Penal Colony and Captain's Inquiry

sub_scenes.title: Treasure Deal and Betrayal
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the prisoner's offer of treasure and the Captain's subsequent betrayal.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival in England and Renewed Vow

sub_scenes.title: The Vigil and Midnight Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows Jordan's patient wait and the confrontation with the Captain at his home.

sub_scenes.title: Deadly Treasure in the Attic
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene culminates in the deadly encounter in the attic over the treasure.

Major_Arcs.title: Vincent Matthews' Ghost Story
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc narrates a ghost story involving Vincent Matthews, a condemned murderer, and the haunted Matthews estate.

sub_scenes.title: Initial Conflict and Sentencing
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene briefly sets up an initial conflict before shifting to Vincent Matthews' sentencing.

sub_scenes.title: The Haunted Matthews Estate
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces the problem of the haunted Matthews estate and the arrival of the supernatural investigator.

narrative_arcs.title: The Realtor's Problem with Matthews Estate
Concerns about Disposing of the Matthews Estate
Rumors of Vincent Matthews' Ghost and Tenant Troubles
Warning of Evil and Strange Occurrences at the Old House

sub_scenes.title: Confrontation with Vincent Matthews' Ghost
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Northrup's solo entry into the haunted house and his confrontation with Vincent Matthews' ghost.

narrative_arcs.title: Initial Assault and Claim of Superiority

sub_scenes.title: Rosalind's Forgiveness and Resolution
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene concludes the ghost story with the philosophical discussion, summoning of Rosalind, and the resolution through forgiveness and brotherly love.

narrative_arcs.title: Confession and the Path to Salvation
Revelation of Murder and the Need for Forgiveness
The Plea for Brotherly Love and Redemption
Entering the House and Explaining Unexplained Events

Major_Arcs.title: The Tragedy of Henry Hudson
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc recounts the historical tragedy of Henry Hudson's voyages and his ultimate demise due to mutiny in the Arctic.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction and First Voyage Proposition
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces Henry Hudson and the Dutch East India Company's proposition for his first voyage.

narrative_arcs.title: The Unsolved Fate of Henry Hudson
The Dutch East India Company's Proposition to Captain Hudson

sub_scenes.title: First Voyage and Hudson River Exploration
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene describes Hudson's first voyage, the crew's discontent, and the exploration of the Hudson River.

narrative_arcs.title: Crew's Discontent and Exploration of Hudson River
Hudson's Failure and Return to Holland

sub_scenes.title: Second Voyage and Mutiny
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene narrates Hudson's second, ill-fated voyage, the crew's despair, and the eventual mutiny.

narrative_arcs.title: Another Voyage Backed and Hudson's Hope
Extreme Northerly Route and Crew's Despair

Major_Arcs.title: Hassan the Arabian Knight and the Tartar Threat
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc tells the story of Hassan, the Arabian Knight, and his mission to rescue a kidnapped woman from the Tartar leader, Kurgan.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction of Conflict and Mission Briefing
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces the Tartar threat and Hassan's summons by the Caliph for a rescue mission.

narrative_arcs.title: Introduction of the Arabian Knight and the Tartar Threat
Summoning and Mission Briefing by the Caliph
The Rescue Mission: Kidnapped Daughter of Ali-Ben-Ali

sub_scenes.title: Journey and Approaching the Tartar Camp
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Hassan's journey towards the Tartar camp and encounters along the way.

narrative_arcs.title: Hassan Sets Out to Confront the Tartars
Journey to the Oasis of El Sholem
Discovery of Tartar Trail at the Oasis
Encounter and Warning from a Traveler
Offering of Water and Continued Warning
Reaching the Outskirts and Preparing to Strike

sub_scenes.title: Infiltration and Rescue
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details Hassan's infiltration of the Tartar camp, his search for the captive, and the ensuing combat.

narrative_arcs.title: Inside the Camp - Seeking the Daughter
The Signal and the Unfair Fight Begins
Victory Assured and Demands to Kurgan
